page.title: 10Tring Library
page.content: Last year the Library was in Akeman street but that one was closed and a new one was built in the High Street. When it was built the builders put on the front of the Library lettering saying "tring library".But lots of people complained about the T and the L so it was corrected. Inside there is a copier that you have to pay 10 pence a sheet to use. Besides books,the Library lends tapes and records.Part of the Library has childrens and teenagers books,another has tapes and records,the rest of the Library has adults books and maps. We did a survey of our school to see how often the children use the Library,25 children use the Library once a week,28 children use the Library once every 2 weeks,15 children use the Library once every 3 weeks,47 never use the Library.
